title: Be alert and take precautions like masks and booster doses: Telangana DPH - Telangana Today
content:
1. Be alert and take precautions like masks and booster doses: Telangana DPH  Telangana Today
  2. Mask policy still in force in Telangana, Director of Public Health clarifies  The News Minute
  3. Covid-19 situation under control in Telangana, yet need to be cautious, says DH Srinivasa Rao  The Hans India
  4. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Hyderabad: In the wake of the recent rise of Covid infections in New Delhi, Uttar Pradesh and Haryana, the Telangana health authorities on Thursday issued an alert and urged people to take precautions like wearing masks at crowded locations and Covid booster doses to vulnerable individuals. Director of Public Health (DPH), Dr G Srinivasa Rao [â€¦]
